title: How to Log in to Telegram Web on a PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to web.telegram.org in your browser.
steps.content: Go to web.telegram.org in your browser. Open a browser on your computer and type web.telegram.org in the address bar, hit the Enter button. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select your country.
steps.content: Select your country. Click on Country and select your country from the list. You can use the search bar to find your country. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Type your phone number.
steps.content: Type your phone number. Enter your registered phone number without the country the country code in the Phone number field and hit the Enter button or click on Next . Also, confirm your phone number from the pop-up screen.

steps.title: Enter the confirmation code.
steps.content: Enter the confirmation code. When you confirm your phone number, Telegram will send you a verification code to your phone. Type the confirmation code in the Enter your code box.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. When you enter the confirmation code correctly, the web page automatically redirects to your account. [3] X Research source Done!
